name: Aber Hier Leben, Nein Danke
body:

- updated translations

body: - Settings screen

name: Gehen Die Leute
body:
- fixes a crash in the search dialog
- Hebrew language version

name: Gehen Die Leute (23 Special Edition)
body:
- Removed support for Android Auto
--> Don't ask (⊙_☉)

name: Gehen Die Leute
body:
- Polish language version
- small bug fixes
- small performance enhancements

name: Gehen Die Leute
body:
- notifies user when voice initiated search did not succeed.

Note: Sorry folks. This is the third update in two days. The apps seems to get rejected in the Play Store, because the automated testing for Android Auto compatibility assumes that the app reacts to the voice command "Play music", even if no podcast has been added. I am not sure what to do. I might just drop Android Auto support altogether.

name: Gehen Die Leute
body: - notifies user that voice controlled playback cannot succeed, if podcast list is empty.

name: Gehen Die Leute
body: - prevents a crash caused by playback command issued via voice control, when podcast list is still empty

name: Gehen Die Leute
body:
- basic podcast search on the gpodder.net service
- Portuguese language version
- Dutch language version

name: Drüben Auf Dem Hügel (Stuttgart Edition)
body: - fixes (another aspect of) auto clean-up

name: Drüben Auf Dem Hügel
body: - fixed auto clean-up (should free up some space on your device)

name: Drüben Auf Dem Hügel
body: - minor stability improvements

name: Drüben Auf Dem Hügel
body:
- improved accessibility via TalkBack
- Norwegian language version
- stability improvements (*)

(*) Audio files are stored in a slightly different way from v0.7.8 on. If that causes problems (which it should not), please have a look at the Troubleshooting tips (https://github.com/y20k/escapepod/wiki/Troubleshooting).

name: Drüben Auf Dem Hügel
body: - fixes a bug where the playback position was not saved correctly

name: Drüben Auf Dem Hügel
body: - fix for Android Auto (previous version got rejected in Play Store)

name: Drüben Auf Dem Hügel
body:
- German language version
- support for Android's Auto-Backup feature
- several bug fixes

name: Drüben Auf Dem Hügel
body:
- brings back basic support for Android Auto
- brings back AudioFX equalizer integration
- bug fixes

name: Drüben Auf Dem Hügel

- had to temporarily remove support for Android Auto
(update got rejected on Google Play because of missing voice support)

name: Drüben Auf Dem Hügel
body: - had to remove AudioFX equalizer integration due to a bug

name: Drüben Auf Dem Hügel
body:
- new playback speed switch 
- longer episode descriptions are displayed in show notes, if available in RSS feed
- bug fixes

name: Drüben Auf Dem Hügel
body: - initial stable release

name: Jungs, Hier Kommt Der Masterplan
body:
- basic show notes viewer
- changed typography (Material Design Components)
- bug fixes

**Note:** For the problem that single episodes appear twice in the list, there is unfortunately only a brute force solution: [Delete Application Data](https://github.com/y20k/escapepods/wiki/Troubleshooting#option-2-delete-application-data)

name: Der Cousin
body:
- sleep timer
- basic support for Android Auto and Wear OS
- debug log file feature
- bug fixes

name: An Diesen Langweiligen Tagen
body:
- fixes problems with podcasts using feedburner
- improved scrolling performance
- new debug log file feature

name: An Diesen Langweiligen Tagen
body: * initial release
